name: Myla Di'Kaich
overview: Myla di'Kaich — the largest and most weirdly named space supermarket. From rubber band motor drives to coat hanger aerials, from blancmange mix to gravy powder, dehydrated — anything could be supplied for the discerning spacer. But when all the life support computers fail and the remote stock robots go into memory overload then its anybody's guess where the right parts are located. Add deranged escalators and a manic travellator or two, and then you have some idea of the enormity of the task faced. All I wanted was a dozen bits to get my craft on its way again, but where to start looking? and how to avoid robots puncturing my suit? and where is the oxygen supply?...
